error.signature: Error loading state: state snapshot was created by Terraform v1.6, which is newer than current v1.5

verdict.summary: Terraform state was written by a newer version than the one you're running.

dead_ends.action: Editing the state file to change the version number
dead_ends.why_fails: Corrupts the state file; Terraform may not understand newer format

dead_ends.action: Creating a new state with terraform init
dead_ends.why_fails: Loses track of all existing infrastructure; resources become unmanaged

workarounds.action: Upgrade Terraform to at least the version that created the state
workarounds.how: tfenv install 1.6 && tfenv use 1.6 â€” or download from hashicorp.com

workarounds.action: Ensure all team members use the same Terraform version via .terraform-version or required_version
